diff_hunk:
@@ -141,6 +141,8 @@ def _optimize_graph(graph, operator_export_type):
     torch._C._jit_pass_peephole(graph)
     torch._C._jit_pass_lint(graph)
 
+    # onnx only supports tensors, but 1 / 2 = 0.5 and tensor(1) / tensor(2) = 0
+    torch._C._jit_pass_prepare_division_for_onnx(graph)
body: There is a RAW mode of ONNX export where everything gets turned into ATen-in-caffe2 operators (see the if statement below), but this pass will introduce onnx::Cast operators even in that mode. Is it not possible to do this fixup as part of `def div` in symbolic.py?
